name: PJ IMDB
author: Pouriya Amjadzadeh

sections.description:
This plugin will add a metabox in your posts to get information of the movies

Features:

  • Custom Special API
  • Nice Metabox UI.
  • Without any advertising.
  • Using ajax to get info.

Language Support:

  • English
  • Persian
  • Arabic
  • French

Pro Version

  • Full List details return
  • Show StarRating of Vote
  • Return live rating
  • Create taxonomy from Fields

Donations

You can Donate plugin author here http://pamjad.me/donate
sections.installation:
1. Upload “pj-imdb” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How can show metabox in our template?

Just go to this LINK and read functions to use thats.
sections.changelog:
2.1

  • Fixed some bugs.
  • Added Media Manager Support for posters

2.0

  • Fixed All Problems.
  • Use new API PJ IMDB
  • Upload posters to your host
  • New functions for fetch data
  • Support Gutenberg Editor

1.1.2

  • Seted apikey for free for all users. Thanks to IMDB CONNECTOR

1.1.1

  • Fixed minor bugs

1.1.0

  • Fixed fetch data.
  • Now rates is live
  • Changed “IMDB” function to “pjimdb”
  • CSS Now is optimized

1.0.1

  • Fixed IMDB ID field bug.
